name: 2024 9th International Conference on Energy Materials and Applications
content: Publication: Option 1: Accepted and registered papers with presentation will be published in below listed journals of Scientific.Net collection. Papers will be sent for indexing by Scopus, Inspec, Chemical Abstracts Service, Google Scholar etc. - Defect and Diffusion Forum (DDF) (ISSN print 1012-0386 / ISSN web 1662-9507) - Solid State Phenomena (SSP) (ISSN print 1012-0394 / ISSN web 1662-9779) - Materials Science Forum (MSF) (ISSN print 0255-5476 / ISSN web 1662-9752) - Key Engineering Materials (KEM) (ISSN print 1013-9826 / ISSN web 1662-9795) Option 2: The accepted (Registered & Presented) full papers will be published in the International Journal of Smart Grid and Clean Energy (IJSGCE). ISSN: 2373-3594 (Online), which will be indexed by INSPEC (IET), Electronic Journals Library, Chemical Abstracts Services (CAS), Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, ProQuest, CNKI.
